Keywords: Alpha Flight , Avengers , Jean Grey School For Higher Learning , Weapon X , X-Force , X-Men
Real Name: Logan
Special Powers
I'M THE BEST AT WHAT I DO: Combat Reflexes. // FREE: Make a close attack targeting a character that missed Wolverine or failed to break away from Wolverine since your last turn.
HEALING FACTOR: Willpower. // At the end of your turn, you may roll a d6 and heal Wolverine equal to half the result.

Comments
July 24, 2021
Organous
Yeah, he's a bit much to ask for 100 points. They gave him some nice stuff, but it's just asking too much for 100. Knock it down to 75 and we can talk.
July 24, 2021
Darkheart
In the age of VD this 100 pt HC will usually be 2 shotted by an average opponent in a single turn. That is assuming it is a constructed event and an opponent has average luck and at least 2 decent ranged attackers with at least one available outwit. But yes, most will. That said, if I hit one of these Legacy cards I will use this Logan on an Alpha Flight team, but all the other KWs have better options, even JGSFHL and Avengers.
July 14, 2021
AVENTIMATE
I’m on the fence on this one.
July 8, 2021
Buckwheat
I'm inclined to agree with Slade; he does seem expensive. However, I have a feeling that he'll be more effective than he looks on paper. It's often going to take 2-3 hits, in one turn, to put him down. And, if you can't, he can heal up to 3 damage, via his Trait, and potentially 1 more via X-Men. It's nice that his defense powers vary, so it can potentially take multiple uses of Outwit, in one turn, to keep it vanilla. The fact that Perplex can no longer modify damage certainly helps him.
July 3, 2021
Slade Wilson
A great take on an already good dial. Still feels costly in todays game.
July 2, 2021
bam
Combat Reflexes, free Attack after someone tries to start something, Willpower & a regeneration like power??? SIGN ME UP! Just add Stealth or Exospex!
